notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: H.T. designed the experiment. K.T. and H.T. grew the crystal. K.T., K.Naw., N.K., H.T., S.O.-K. and K.Nak. performed the INS experiments. K. Naw. and T.J.S. worked out the neutron-data and theoretical analysis. H.S., K.Naw., T.J.S., and H.U. performed the single crystal XRD experiments. K.Naw., T.J.S., and H.T. wrote the manuscript.
